transcript_chunks.text: here are some fun weapons you can make with Zelda tears of the kingdoms fusibility add up a goblin arm and I fused it to a fire hydrant now I have a fire hydrant Hammer that spews out water with every swing I also tried fusing my sword with some choo choo jelly with results that weren't as exciting as I expected one of my favorite new Tools in tears of the kingdom is the flame emitter when I fuse it to my shield it creates a flamethrower that spews fire whenever I ready my shield for defense those are just a few of the incredible amounts of combinations you can create with fuse there's so many more but for now
